mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FINDSTU (FINDSTU_ID, USER_NAME, FINDSTU_TITLE, FINDSTU_CONTENT, FINDSTU_DATE) VALUES(#{findstu_id}, #{user_name}, #{findstu_title}, #{findstu_content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT F.FINDSTU_ID, F.FINDSTU_TITLE, F.FINDSTU_CONTENT , F.USER_NAME , F.FINDSTU_DATE , F.FINDSTU_VIEW AS findstu_view , F."FINDSTU_LIKE" FROM FINDSTU F JOIN ACCOUNTS A ON F.USER_NAME = A.AC_NAME WHERE F.FINDSTU_ID = #{findstu_id}

SELECT F.FINDSTU_ID, F.FINDSTU_TITLE, F.FINDSTU_CONTENT , F.USER_NAME , F.FINDSTU_DATE , F.FINDSTU_VIEW AS findstu_view , F."FINDSTU_LIKE" FROM FINDSTU F JOIN ACCOUNTS A ON F.USER_NAME = A.AC_NAME WHERE F.FINDSTU_ID = #{findstu_id}

SELECT FINDSTU_ID, USER_NAME, FINDSTU_BID , FINDSTU_VIEWED , FINDSTU_LATEST_VIEW_DATE AS findstu_latestViewDate , FINDSTU_LIKED FROM FINDSTU_STATICS WHERE USER_NAME = #{user_name} AND FINDSTU_BID = #{findstu_bId}

SET FINDSTU_LIKED = 'Y'

mapper.select: SELECT F.FINDSTU_ID, F.FINDSTU_TITLE, F.FINDSTU_CONTENT , F.USER_NAME , F.FINDSTU_DATE , F.FINDSTU_VIEW AS findstu_view , F."FINDSTU_LIKE" FROM FINDSTU F JOIN ACCOUNTS A ON F.USER_NAME = A.AC_NAME ORDER BY F.FINDSTU_ID DESC
